<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77924</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77924</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ad7af036-1360-470c-a305-fd5934cf84f9#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A gázok alakja</string>
            <string language="en">shape of gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form der Gase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forme des gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">forma dos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">figura dei gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μορφή των αερίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dimensión de una variable de gases</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A léggömbbe fújt levegő a ballon alakját veszi fel</string>
            <string language="en">the air in the balloon takes the shape of it</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">gáz, alak</string>
            <string language="en">gas, shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Luft im Ballon nimmt die Form von ihr</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'air dans le ballon prend la forme de lui</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o ar no balão faz exame da forma dele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'aria nell'aerostato gli prende la figura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ο αέρας στο μπαλόνι παίρνει τη μορφή από το</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el aire en el globo toma la dimensión de una 
variable de él</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas, Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">gaz, forme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gás, forma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gas, figura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αέριο, μορφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gas, dimensión de una variable</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>195</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77924</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=ad7af036-1360-470c-a305-fd5934cf84f9&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
